about_the_game:
BlastFort is a free-to-play multiplayer side-scrolling shooter! With a wide selection of weapons and unique special items, gameplay is fun for everyone! Fight along side your friends in Classic Mode, challenge your friends to a duel in Arena Mode, or play a unique game set with Soccer Mode! Use your weapons and special items to get as far as possible before AI takes over!

BlastFort offers three unique multiplayer modes and up to 10 players in multiplayer matches for everyone to enjoy in their own way, while still using the same base mechanics! Classic mode spawns endless waves of enemies that get progressively harder! Arena mode pits you against up to 9 other players in a free-for-all fight to see who is the last one standing! And soccer mode puts players into two teams to see who can take supremacy over the soccer field and get more goals than the opponent(s)!

BlastFort also offers 20 unique items/weapons, and tens of unlockable/purchasable player skins! Fight off robots with a heavy Minigun! Blast them with a laser beam with the powerful Beacon Gun! Freeze enemies in place with the Sub-Zero Rifle! Use special items, like the Teleporter to get out of tricky situations! Or the Machine Turret to guard some area for you!
detailed_description:
Update Notes

  • Updated Weapon Textures!
  • A brand new UI overhaul
  • Redone maps!
  • 9 all-new game skins!
  • New drone, bomb-host, destroyer, and mirror-man enemies!
  • New Knight's Shield DLC includes 2 skins, 1 new item, and an item skin!
  • Rebalanced Weapons and Items
  • Improved AI for default enemies
  • New progress bar for classic mode/singleplayer
  • Added a new statistics menu
  • Added Shotgun recoil
  • Sticky grenades now release fragments that damage nearby enemies
  • Added enemy knockback to the Assault Rifle
  • Added screen shake to weapons, configurable through the Accessibility menu
  • Added optional Enemy Health Indicators, accessible from the Accessibility menu
  • Auto-reload is now an optional setting, configurable through the Accessibility menu
  • Now includes map 'medals'
  • New rendering engine
  • The rate of refresh for client inputs has been increased
  • Changed to local positioning for multiplayer games to run more accurately
  • Updated the effects of the Colorblind Mode
  • Players are only affected by knockback from their own explosions in Arena and Soccer mode
  • Added individual volume sliders for SFX, Ambient, and Music.
  • Added menu animations
  • New video settings menu allows you to toggle Pixel Rounding, Fancy Scaling, and Fancy Graphics
  • Updated icons and models
  • Replaced Jet Boots with Jetpack, including a physical texture
  • Drones no longer spawn immediately upon game start, but rather are spawned using ammo, similar to the turret items
  • Changed grenade physics iterations for performance
  • Fixed bugs relating to the Beacon Gun and Subzero Rifle not working correctly as a peer in multiplayer
  • Fixed a bug causing screenshots to not work correctly
  • Fixed an issue causing heavy input lag
  • The state of the touch controls toggle is now saved


New DLC Available

Introducing: The Knight's Shield Expansion Pack!
The Knight's Shield Expansion Pack for BlastFort unlocks 2 new skins, a brand new force-field item, and an exclusive item skin!
Check out the awesomeness of the new BlastFort Guarded Knight skin! Use the new force-field item to protect yourself from incoming waves of enemies, and projectiles!


Update Notes

  • Added the ultimate achievement: Get a score of 100,000 in singleplayer in the Hell Scape map using only an Assault Rifle and Grenades, while not catching fire at all! (we're not even sure if that's possible)
  • Fixed issues with multiplayer crashing for peers for no reason
  • Added support for custom WebRTC WebSocket servers to ensure future compatibility (Officially Supported Signaling Server)
  • Fixed an issue causing Forcefields/Grenades to not work correctly in multiplayer on touch devices
  • Updated physics iterations for Forcefields/Grenades
  • Fixed a bug causing the game to hang upon the games end due to repeated snapshots
  • Fixed a bug causing the on screen keyboard to display the wrong selector over the space bar
